channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: Did Elon Musk’s Grok mistranslate PM Modi’s Maldives post?
‘Biggest FTA’: What gets cheaper in India, how will Europe benefit?
‘Discombobulator’: The secret weapon Trump says US used to capture Maduro
She is sentenced to 10 years for calling Pakistan a terrorist state. Who is Imaan Mazari?
Protests, resignations: Why uproar over new UGC equity regulations has intensified
Trump deploys his ‘border czar’ to Minneapolis amid protests: Who is Tom Homan?
Russia-Ukraine peace talks in Abu Dhabi show progress, but final deal remains contentious
item.description: For the first time since Russia’s 2022 invasion, the US, Russia and Ukraine have launched high-level trilateral talks in Abu Dhabi, set to continue on February 1, combining rare diplomatic momentum with entrenched deadlock on core issues

item.title: Look beyond FTA: A chastened, humbled, pragmatic Europe could be a great strategic partner for India
item.description: Trump’s attempted Greenland grab was one abuse too many even for the collective docility of a self-pitying continent

item.title: The Oscars don’t reward cinema, they ratify the narrative of the moment
item.description: Awards function less as arbiters of cinema than as archivists of institutional mood. They tell us what the industry wished to reward in a particular year—what anxieties it sought to soothe, what narratives it needed to elevate, and what discomforts it chose to avoid

item.title: How India-Israel ties go far beyond Trump’s ‘Board of Peace’
item.description: Neither the Gaza conflict nor any externally driven peace architecture alters the foundational logic of India-Israel cooperation, which rests on capability, reliability, and shared security experiences rather than ideological alignment

item.title: Discovering Rann: Festivals, heritage and cultural treasures
item.description: There is no better time of the year to visit Gujarat’s Rann of Kutch than in winter, with the surrounding places offering a rich blend of history, culture and fun

item.title: India-EU trade deal: Europe’s bet to hedge a Trumpian world order
item.description: Europe’s response to a rattled global order and the fracture in transatlantic ties has been clear, coherent, and deliberate: diversify risk, deepen partnerships. India sits at the apex of that strategy
